docs.lead_paragraph: In the three months before she entered the hospital, Margaret Garvey's* body weight had dropped an alarming 30 pounds. headline.main: SHOCKING THE DEPRESSED BACK TO LIFE

docs.abstract: Use of modern electroconvulsive treatments to help severely disturbed mental patients described; illus; Dr Michel R Mandel, head of Mass Gen Hosp unit, says therapeutic brain stimulation is valid treatment with 'terrible' reputation; hosp's treatment described (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 16 Dr. Donald Kennedy, head of the Food and Drug Administration for the last two years, is to return to the tranquillity of a college campus at the end of the month after being a sitting target for food and Health faddists and the powerful drug and farm lobbies and after losing almost every policy battle in which he has engaged.

headline.main: F.D.A. CHIEF HEADING FOR LESS TRYING JOB; Donald Kennedy, the Loser in Most Battles Over Policy, Is Going Back to Tranquil Campus

docs.abstract: FDA head Donald Kennedy will leave post to become university provost (S)
